What are the treatments for Chanarin-Dorfman syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Chanarin-Dorfman syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Triglyceride storage disease with ichthyosis  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Ichthyosis vulgaris   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitat
